resources.string:
We're sorry that you're having pain. 

Take a few moments to record your symptoms. 
Tell us where your pain is?
Please rate the severity of your pain on the scale of 1 to 10
You are currently experiencing no pain.
You are having some pain, but it\'s hardly noticeable.
You are beginning to notice the pain.
You are sometimes distracted by the pain.
You are constantly distracted by pain but can perform usual activities.
The pain is bad enough that you need to interrupt or limit some activities.
The pain is bad enough that you need to interrupt or limit some activities.\nHave some rest and follow your condition, contact a physician if you need to.
The pain is in constant focus. You can not do daily activities.\nIt would be wise to consult with your physician.
The pain is awful, you can not do anything.\nIt would be wise to contact medical staff as soon as possible.
You feel the pain is unbearable.\n⚠️ CONTACT A DOCTOR IMMEDIATELY ⚠️
The pain is the worst you have ever experienced.\n⚠️ CONTACT YOUR EMERGENCY SERVICE IMMEDIATELY ⚠️
Thank you for registering your symptoms. \nWe hope you\'ll feel better soon!\nRemember to check in with your doctor if you don\'t.
